mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trading (trading_seq, user_seq, company_number, company_name, trading_type, trading_price, trading_amount, trading_earnings_ratio ) VALUES (trading_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userSeq}, #{companyNumber}, #{companyName}, #{tradingType}, #{tradingPrice}, #{tradingAmount} #{tradingEarningsRatio})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_seq user_seq, c.earnings_ratio earnings_ratio FROM (SELECT each_value.user_seq, ( each_value.a - each_value.b ) / each_value.b * 100 earnings_ratio FROM (SELECT user_seq, Sum(trading_price * trading_amount) a, Sum(( ( 100 / ( 100 + trading_earnings_ratio ) ) * trading_price ) * trading_amount) b FROM trading WHERE trading_type = 2 GROUP BY user_seq) each_value) c WHERE ROWNUM <= #{value} ORDER BY earnings_ratio DESC
